Package com.opengamma.strata.measure

Provides the ability to calculate high-level measures on financial instruments.

The measures can be accessed in three ways:

  • for one trade/position and one scenario, such as methods on com.opengamma.strata.measure.swap.SwapTradeCalculations SwapTradeCalculations
  • for one trade/position and many scenarios, such as methods on com.opengamma.strata.measure.swap.SwapTradeCalculations SwapTradeCalculations
  • for a mixed portfolio of trades/positions and many scenarios, see CalculationRunner and functions such as SwapCalculationFunction
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdvancedMeasures
    The advanced set of measures which can be calculated by Strata.
    AdvancedMeasuresTest
    Test AdvancedMeasures.
    Measures
    The standard set of measures that can be calculated by Strata.
    MeasuresTest
    Test Measures.
    StandardComponents
    Factory methods for creating standard Strata components.
    StandardComponentsTest
    Test StandardComponents.
    ValuationZoneTimeDefinition
    Definition of valuation zone and time.
    ValuationZoneTimeDefinition.Meta
    The meta-bean for ValuationZoneTimeDefinition.
    ValuationZoneTimeDefinitionTest
    Test ValuationZoneTimeDefinition.
